channel.title: How do I change the price of items on my server?
channel.description: Well on my server I added a santa hat in the shops and it is only 204 GP!!! I want to change the price, but I am not to sure how? Thx in advance pl0x answer.

item.title: How do I change the price of items on my server?
item.dc:creator: @skate0ordie12345 skate0ordie12345
item.description:
@skate0ordie12345 wrote:

i didnt say use google. i said use the search bar because its there for a reason and this is most common question…

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the price of items on my server?

item.title: How do I change the price of items on my server?
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

Ii Claw iI:

Open item.cfg what should be in your config folder. Then open it with wordpad/notepad. Then you see items with bonuses. Now change the first 3 numbers to your price of the item. Easy huh?

Yes it is easy tyvm :P, for the others who were acting like smart asses skate0ordie12345 being a dick telling me to use google to increase his post count, pretty sure he came up with some lame pass for “help” cause he had no clue how to even answer this lol… tyvm again :).

Read full topic

item.title: How do I change the price of items on my server?
item.dc:creator: @mod_p mod p
item.description:
@mod_p wrote:

verry easy dude… go in to your config, than open “item.CFG” if you don’t got config just open the item.CFG, open it search for “santa_hat” when you found it you see somethink like this:
ID NAME --------------- on the **** sings are standing numbers
change the numbers to the price you want it. good luck with it dude.
1050 Santa_hat It’s_a_Santa_hat. **** **** ****

Read full topic
